question.text: Which of the following are considered either child abuse or inappropriate conduct when participating in child-related activities:
question.option: Shaking a child to get his attention
Being under the influence of drugs or alcohol
Ignoring a child who you suspect is under the influence of drugs or alcohol
Engaging in sexually inappropriate conduct of any kind toward or in the presence of a child
Using curse words or words discriminatory in nature
Neglecting the duty of care for a child under the adultâ€™s supervision
